attributes.action: help to keep the cassette tape in circulation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With high street eletronic stores pulling their cassette decks out of circulation, the death of the tape seems to be just on the horizon. We need to help keep the cassette alive! The tape is an important part of the music industry, what next? CDs being pulled out? We need to stop this before that becomes a reality

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
